keyMappings: # Insert your preferred key mappings here.
searchEngines:
sxb: https://search.rhscz.eu/search?q=
sxp: https://search.sapti.me/search?q=
ddg: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=
gg: https://www.google.com/search?q=
y: https://yandex.com/search/?text=
yi: https://yandex.com/images/search?text=
btw: https://archlinux.org/packages/?q=
gr: https://www.goodreads.com/search?q=
sv: https://stardewvalleywiki.com/mediawiki/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&search=%s
lb: https://letterboxd.com/search/
pdb: https://www.protondb.com/search?q=
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=
ytm: https://music.youtube.com/search?q=
userDefinedLinkHintCss:
div.internalVimiumHintMarker {                                     
  background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #686868 0%, #000000 100%);
  border: none;                                                    
  padding: 2px 4px 1px 4px;                                        
  border-radius: 0.25em;                                           
  box-shadow: 0em 0.1em 0.6em 0.1em #000000;                       
}                                                                  
                                                                   
div.internalVimiumHintMarker span {                                
  color: #e0e6f0;                                                  
  font-size: inherit;                                              
  font-family: JetBrainsMono Nerd Font;                            
  text-shadow: #000000;                                            
}                                                                  
                                                                   
div.internalVimiumHintMarker > .matchingCharacter {                
  color: #747474;                                                  
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar {                                                        
  border: 1px solid #000000;                                       
  box-shadow: 0px 2px 10px #000000;                                
  background-color: #191919;                                       
}                                                                  
#vomnibar .vomnibarSearchArea {                                    
  background-color: #191919;                                       
  border: none;                                                    
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar input {                                                  
  color: #e0e6f0;                                                  
  background-color: #191919;                                       
  border: 1px solid #191919;                                       
  box-shadow: none;                                                
  font-family: JetBrainsMono Nerd Font;                            
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibarInput::selection {                                        
  color: #000000;                                                  
  background-color: #e0e6f0;                                       
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul {                                                     
  margin: 0;                                                       
  background-color: #000000;                                       
}                                                                  
                                                                   
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul li {                                                  
  border-bottom: 1px solid #686868;                                
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul li.vomnibarSelected {                                 
  border-bottom: 1px solid #686868;                                
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul li.vomnibarSelected {                                 
  background-color: #191919;                                       
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul li .vomnibarSource {                                  
  color: #8e8e8e;                                                  
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul li .vomnibarTitle {                                   
  color: #e0e6f0;                                                  
}                                                                  
#vomnibar ul li .vomnibarTitle .vomnibarMatch,                     
#vomnibar ul li .vomnibarUrl .vomnibarMatch {                      
  color: #747474;                                                  
  font-weight: normal;                                             
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar ul li .vomnibarUrl {                                     
  color: #868686;                                                  
}                                                                  
                                                                   
#vomnibar li .vomnibarTopHalf {                                    
  overflow: visible;                                               
}
